detail: Amrutha Venkatesh had her musical training under Gurus Sri M.T. Selvanarayana, Smt Charumathi Ramachandran and Prince Rama Varma.n  She is one of the upcoming young musicians in the Carnatic field and had performed over 300 concerts in leading sabhas such as The Music Academy, Narada Gana Sabha, Sri Krishna Gana Sabha, and others.
